code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Mouse=function Mouse(){useEffect(function(){var handleCursor=function handleCursor(e){document.querySelector('.cursor').style.top=e.pageY+"px";document.querySelector('.cursor').style.left=e.pageX+"px";};window.addEventListener('mousemove',handleCursor);var handleHover=function handleHover(){document.querySelector('.cursor').classList.add('hovered');};var handleLeave=function handleLeave(){document.querySelector('.cursor').style.transition=".3s ease-out";document.querySelector('.cursor').classList.remove('hovered');};document.querySelectorAll('.hover').forEach(function(link){link.addEventListener('mouseover',handleHover);link.addEventListener('mouseleave',handleLeave);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"cursor"});};export default Mouse;
